attachments.text:
1) Must be out of college minimum 1 year. 
2) Must follow naming convention for display name: “First Last [Lv#]” 
3)Must add professional title to your profile.
attachments.title: HOUSE RULES:

attachments.text:
1) Click on “Channels” to the left side bar. 
2) Scroll through, join any channel that excites you. 
3) If there isn’t a space that you are looking for, create it yourself! (Please create a “Private” channel for a space that does not apply to the larger MS group.) 
4) Jump in, ask questions, give tips, send gifs, connect, connect, connect. :heart:
attachments.title: HOW TO GET STARTED:

welcome.text: Hello! Welcome to the Stacks-Slack, also known as "401stacKs", a resource and space for Main Stacks graduates to discuss work, career opportunities, and overall life tips. We may have finished dancing together, but we’re not done yet.

responses.slash_intro:
Thanks for playing with an experimental feature! Your response was not saved. 
If you have any questions, post them in #dev
